column4: I downloaded the .iso from BitTorrent, now what?  "After your download begins you'll be given additional instructions on how to create and use your Ubuntu CD.", but not for BitTorrent.
Froad, FWIW wubi timed out twice at the metalink/.iso stage for me.
you can always download the ISO w/ another metalink client. that might be faster
yup Torrent of the kubuntu amd64 iso worked great.
